mapper.select: SELECT WRITER_SEQ, WRITER_NAME, INTRO, STATUS, HISTORY, PROFILE_FILE_ORIGINAL,PUBLIC_RELATIONS FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY u.CW DESC)AS RNUM,w.WRITER_SEQ, w.WRITER_NAME, w.INTRO, w.STATUS, w.HISTORY, w.PROFILE_FILE_ORIGINAL,w.PUBLIC_RELATIONS FROM WRITER w , (SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(USER_SEQ)OVER(PARTITION BY WRITER_SEQ)AS CW, WRITER_SEQ FROM USER_SUBSCRIBE) u WHERE w.WRITER_SEQ = u.WRITER_SEQ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT WRITER_SEQ, ARTICLE_SEQ, TITLE, CONT, to_char(UPLOAD_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd')AS UPLOAD_DATE, VIEWCOUNT, LIKES, CATEGORYS, FILE_ORIGINAL FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY VIEWCOUNT DESC)AS RNUM, WRITER_SEQ, ARTICLE_SEQ, TITLE, CONT, UPLOAD_DATE, VIEWCOUNT, LIKES, CATEGORYS, FILE_ORIGINAL FROM ARTICLE) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
